mapper.select: Select h.Collaboration_No , h.Collabo_Req_Index, h.Collabo_Req_No, h.History_Date, History_Title, History_Text ,h.User_Id,r.Collabo_Req_Id,r.Collabo_Req_Title,r.Collabo_Req_Text From History H Join Collabo_Req r on H.Collabo_Req_No= r.Collabo_Req_No and H.Collabo_Req_Index = r.Collabo_Req_Index ORDER BY H.History_Date desc
select MAX((collabo_req_no)+1) as collabo_req_no from COLLABO_REQ

Select h.Collaboration_No , h.Collabo_Req_Index, h.Collabo_Req_No, h.History_Date, History_Title, History_Text ,h.User_Id,r.Collabo_Req_Id,r.Collabo_Req_Title,r.Collabo_Req_Text From History H Join Collabo_Req r on H.Collabo_Req_No= r.Collabo_Req_No and H.Collabo_Req_Index = r.Collabo_Req_Index where H.Collabo_Req_No = #{param1} ORDER BY H.History_Date desc
